results.description: Tom Bailey's match haul of 10-119 helps Lancashire beat Middlesex - their eighth win in 13 Championship games in 2019 and fifth out of five at Old Trafford.
results.shortTitle: Bailey helps promoted Lancs beat Middx
results.title: County Championship: Lancashire's Tom Bailey takes 10 wickets in match as Division Two champions beat Middlesex

thumbnail.altText: Tom Bailey took 10 wickets in a match for the second time in his career - and both times have been against Middlesex, having first done it at Lord's in 2017

results.description: Opener Keaton Jennings is out for 97 for the second time this season as Lancashire build a 211-run lead over Middlesex.

results.title: County Championship: Keaton Jennings makes 97 as Lancashire build lead over Middlesex

results.description: John Simpson hits a career-best 167 not out as Middlesex make 337 all out against Lancashire, who are 14-1 at stumps.

results.description: Bowlers James Anderson and Stuart Broad should not play together for England in the future, says former captain Michael Vaughan.

results.description: Lancashire total 259 against Middlesex, but it is enough to secure the Division Two title, before the visitors collapse to 39-6 in reply.
results.shortTitle: Lancashire all out for 259 but seal title

results.description: Josh Bohannon hits his maiden century as Lancashire make up for a lost morning by earning a first-innings lead over Derbyshire.
